name: Keycloak Connect GraphQL
description: keycloak-connect-graphql is a comprehensive solution for adding keycloak authentication and authorization to Express.js based GraphQL servers. It is used alongside the keycloak-connect middleware to provide useful auth capabilities at the GraphQL level. Features include Authentication and Role Based Access Control (RBAC) on individual Queries, Mutations and fields, Auth and RBAC on Subscriptions, Declarative @auth and @hasRole directives that can be applied directly in the GraphQL Schema, access to Keycloak token/user information in GraphQL resolver context.
